description: Returns the status of a particular EnableControl or DisableControl operation. Displays a message in case of error. Details for an operation are available for 90 days. For usage examples, see the Controls Reference Guide.

parameters.name: operationIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the asynchronous operation, which is used to track status. The operation is available for 90 days.

nested_items.name: controlOperation
nested_items.description: An operation performed by the control.

nested_items.name: controlIdentifier
nested_items.description: The controlIdentifier of the control for the operation.

nested_items.name: enabledControlIdentifier
nested_items.description: The controlIdentifier of the enabled control.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The time that the operation finished.

nested_items.name: operationIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the specified operation.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The time that the operation began.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: One of IN_PROGRESS, SUCEEDED, or FAILED.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: If the operation result is FAILED, this string contains a message explaining why the operation failed.

nested_items.name: targetIdentifier
nested_items.description: The target upon which the control operation is working.
